verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Overwhelmed by love,
Deeper than oceans,
High as the heavens.
Ever living God
Your love has rescued me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All my sin was laid
On Your dear Son,
Your precious One.
All my debt He paid,
Great is Your love for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No-one could ever earn Your love,
Your grace and mercy is free.
Lord, these words are true,
So is my love for You.
